attrs.text:
By signing below, you agree to the following terms of agreement:
 
I will be at least 18 years old by the 1st of January 2023.
My personal data will be processed and used to receive updates about the Reboot Coding Institute application process, including receiving emails and to confirm my age and identity in addition to calls to receive updates on the application process.
I am a Bahrain resident, and have the right to study and work in Bahrain to complete the Reboot Program.
